notify 0.1.0
  • Reference

notify

The goal of notify is to provide interactive logging within a sequence of functions chained by pipes (|>)

Installation

You can install the development version of notify like so:

pak::pkg_install("jofrhwld/notify")

Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

library(notify)

mtcars |>
  notify("Using mtcars") |>
  cov() |>
  notify("Got full covariance matrix") |>
  colMeans() |>
  notify("Calculated column means")
#> • Using mtcars
#> • Got full covariance matrix
#> • Calculated column means
#>         mpg         cyl        disp          hp        drat          wt 
#>  -84.045124   26.736038 1960.037688 1017.051402   -5.589250   13.459061 
#>        qsec          vs          am        gear        carb 
#>  -16.266687   -6.150309   -3.933568   -4.987325   14.498501

# without explicit messages
mtcars |>
  notify() |>
  cov() |>
  notify() |>
  colMeans() |>
  notify()
#> • ~mtcars
#> • cov finished
#> • colMeans finished
#>         mpg         cyl        disp          hp        drat          wt 
#>  -84.045124   26.736038 1960.037688 1017.051402   -5.589250   13.459061 
#>        qsec          vs          am        gear        carb 
#>  -16.266687   -6.150309   -3.933568   -4.987325   14.498501
